attributes.additional_details:
Putting water in plastic bottles and then shipping, flying, driving and hauling it around is an envoirenmental disgrace. UK tap water is perfectly healthy. The entire bottled water industry is a perfect example of the commercial world creating a need for something we don't need, let alone the damnage it does to the envoirenment.
The concept of an eco tax is well established.
I would like to see an eco tax levied on all bottled water and the money spent on saving the planet.
